name: Triple Play Pay
title: Fullstack Software Developer
description: At Triple Play Pay I was able to contribute to software for a wide array of technology and applications in the payments industry. From squashing user-facing bugs in Vue, to developing API endpoints for card present devices in Python, to creating mobile (iOS/Android) application libraries for use in React-Native.

name: GearMinds STEM Academy
title: STEM Instructor
description: An after school program focused on preparing kids of all ages for a job in tech. At GearMinds I tought everything from basic programming priciples using drag-and-drop languages, to showing how simple circuits worked with breadboards and MicroPython, to teaching advanced programming concepts and simple website construction with Python and JavaScript.
